amendment.description: To strike the international tax provisions that are unrelated to the FSC/ETI repeal and eliminate the phase-in of the deduction for qualified production activities income.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3134 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 90.

action.text: Amendment SA 3134 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S5194-5199) To strike the international tax provisions that are unrelated to the FSC/ETI repeal and eliminate the phase-in of the deduction for qualified production activities income.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3134 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 90.
